topology:
根据网络拓扑图和配置文件分析，完善后的网络拓扑描述如下：

该网络拓扑由三台IPv6路由器组成线性连接结构。DeviceA通过接口GigabitEthernet1/0/0（2001:db8:1::1/64）连接到DeviceB的接口GigabitEthernet1/0/0（2001:db8:1::2/64）。DeviceB通过接口GigabitEthernet2/0/0（2001:db8:2::2/64）连接到DeviceC的接口GigabitEthernet1/0/0（2001:db8:2::1/64）。

DeviceA配置了三个LAN网段：接口GigabitEthernet1/0/1连接网段2001:db8:3::1/96，接口GigabitEthernet1/0/3连接网段2001:db8:5::1/96。DeviceC配置了三个LAN网段：接口GigabitEthernet1/0/1连接网段2001:db8:7::1/96，接口GigabitEthernet1/0/2连接网段2001:db8:8::1/96，接口GigabitEthernet1/0/3连接网段2001:db8:9::1/96。

所有IPv6接口均运行RIPng协议，形成统一的RIPng域。DeviceA的接口GigabitEthernet1/0/2配置了IPv4地址10.2.1.1/16，未参与RIPng路由。三台设备通过两条点对点链路（2001:db8:1::/64和2001:db8:2::/64）实现互联，为典型的线性拓扑结构。
requirement: 组网需求如图1-83所示，所有路由器的接口已经配置过IP地址，并且各路由器上都配置了RIPng，RIPng业务正常运行。要求重新在DeviceA和DeviceC上配置水平分割。
steps: 配置过程中需注意以下事项：同时配置水平分割和毒性反转时，只有毒性反转生效；为了提升安全性，推荐部署RIPng的IPSec认证功能。

configs.DeviceA:
#
sysname DeviceA
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:1::1/64
 ripng 1 enable
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/1
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:3::1/96
 ripng 1 enable
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/2
 undo shutdown
 ip address 10.2.1.1 255.255.0.0
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/3
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:5::1/96
 ripng 1 enable
#
ripng
#
return
configs.DeviceB:
#
sysname DeviceB
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:1::2/64
 ripng 1 enable
#
interface GigabitEthernet2/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:2::2/64
 ripng 1 enable
#
return
configs.DeviceC:
#
sysname DeviceC
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/0
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:2::1/64
 ripng 1 enable
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/1
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:7::1/96
 ripng 1 enable
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/2
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:8::1/96
 ripng 1 enable
#
interface GigabitEthernet1/0/3
 undo shutdown
 ipv6 enable
 ipv6 address 2001:db8:9::1/96
 ripng 1 enable
#
ripng
#
return
